lines:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Beloved brother Mutamix is brilliant gobbie! Has braincase full of knowings of airy-self and materia, ever eager to share with uplander and herhis kin.

Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Beloved brother Mutamix is brilliant gobbie! Has braincase full of knowings of airy-self and materia, ever eager to share with uplander and herhis kin.
Poofchox too knows materia muchly─can even join fighty-tool to materia for uplander! ...Er, if secret joiny-skill is not needed, that is.
One day Poofchox will be just as wise and worldly as Mutamix, though! Mark her tongueflaps!
